Method Detail

getSheet

KSheet getSheet(String sheetName)
Get a sheet with a certain name in a workbook.

Parameters:
sheetName - The name of the sheet.
Returns:
The sheet or null if the sheet was not found.

getSheetNames

Returns:
The array of sheet names in the workbook

Returns:
